entry.title: The Dark Knight Before Christmas - A Superbat Year One AU
entry.summary:
Author: EllEmmeCe

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,255Chapters: 18/25Kudos: 21

Summary: Gotham is having a very strange Christmas. Bruce Wayne’s latest vigilante experiment, a horned shadowy figure the press has named “Krampus,” was supposed to terrify criminals. Instead, it has gone viral as Gotham’s new holiday mascot. Clark Kent, investigative reporter and part-time baker, is on the case. He is following Krampus’s trail of cookie crumbs (literally) while secretly moonlighting as “Super Santa” to fix Gotham’s holiday chaos. Between gingerbread turtle clues, a viral photo of Krampus tangled in Christmas lights, and Alfred’s endless commentary, Bruce is one bad cape snag away from losing his mind. Meanwhile, Clark is just trying to figure out if Gotham’s scariest new legend is a monster, a myth, or a very grumpy man who needs a hug. It is a holiday season full of crime, cookies, and questionable branding decisions.

entry.title: Cast in Shade and Light
entry.summary:
Author: reese_rhys

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 350Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 1

Summary: Bruce Wayne refuses to accept defeat. At Wayne Enterprises, his relentless pursuit of solutions consumes him, blurring the line between work and life. But everything changes when Clark Kent, the editor from The Daily Planet, threatens to expose his secret life as Batman. Suddenly, Bruce's secrets are on the verge of being spilled.orA love story about Superman and Batman as they go through their lives as superheroes and everyday civilians. Will two stubborn men be able to give their lives away?

entry.title: Night Falls
entry.summary:
Author: JeLlyFiSh10

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 20,099Chapters: 4/5Kudos: 10

Summary: After Dick Grayson breaks up with Odessa Araxie at her graduation, she figured she’d be done with the man. Never in her life did she think he’d waltz back in nearly 7 years later, and still hold the key to her heart. But when things start to go array for her, she has no choice—and no reason not to—lean on him. Welcome back to the series! I hope you’ve enjoyed the first few parts, but you don’t really have to read them in order to understand this part. I am still terrible at summaries, but I hope y’all will give it a chance!

entry.title: Harold, They're Lesbians
entry.summary:
Author: JessJesstheBest

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,261Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 31

Summary: "Wait, but Steph and Cass didn't tell us where their dates are," Clark said.The various munching noises through the room halted immediately. Everyone turned to look at Clark."What's that, buddy?" Steph asked, in a brightly sinister way.Clark laughed, seeming unsettled by the weird energy the room had taken on. entry.title: tying me to you
entry.summary:
Author: Areiton

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,799Chapters: 11/24Kudos: 58

Summary: It was a gauntlet, getting here, and now that he is--now that there is nothing to do but watch the vows being said and the Families reacting, now he can second guess himself. It's done. Right or wrong, the decision is made. Peter has a husband, bound to him by magic and blood and, in a few minutes, law. He takes a deep breath and for the first time in a very long time, he considers praying.

entry.title: starstruck
entry.summary:
Author: craycr4y

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,303Chapters: 3/6Kudos: 373

Summary: A loud bang shuts down Hal’s train of thoughts, his head swivels towards its direction, wondering if Batman had finally deigned to show up. But it wasn’t him. Instead, the person who shows up is decked out in red and blue; black lines stretch across his suit and meet at his chest to form a symbol of a… spider? Huh. Did Batman change themes? or Spider-Man & Batman are best friends. No, the Justice League doesn't know that. And if you ask Bruce, they never should.Until they do.

entry.summary:

Summary: “Not only did he use the wrong “There” he also used “your” instead of “you’re”,” he said pointing at the screen. “Hmm this is why you write papers” “Perry would kill me for mistakes like this” “Shame, the world losing Superman over a spelling mistake, now that would be a good headline” Bruce said and Clark could see the one side of his mouth was hiked up at the corner. entry.title: Regime of One
entry.summary:
Author: IPreferMemories

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,155Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 31

Summary: Batman is losing the war.His allies are gone, his body is breaking, and Superman is done giving him chances. When the Regime finally catches him, Bruce becomes more than a prisoner—he becomes an obsession.Cut off from the world and held too close by the man he once trusted, Bruce begins to unravel in ways he swore he never would. Hate twists into something unrecognizable, survival becomes a negotiation, and the line between captor and captive blurs with every passing day.There’s a truth beneath it all—one neither of them will face until the end.And when it comes out, it will change everything.

entry.title: Power
entry.summary:
Author: ope-uh-oh (shortjacketlongskirt)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 113,679Chapters: 23/?Kudos: 246

Summary: “Oh, you do like to flirt, don’t you?” Lex accused almost playfully, if not for the sharklike emptiness in his eyes. Bruce sat back as the appetizer plates were taken away and replaced with the entrée: filet mignon in a mushroom gravy, served with truffles, asparagus, and black garlic potatoes. He couldn’t help but think Clark would have appreciated this. And he desperately wished he was here with him rather than Vicki. He flashed a playful grin at Lex. “Flirting is what makes the world go round, Lex. What is that quote attributed to Oscar Wilde? ‘Everything in the world is about sex except sex, which is about power’. It applies to everything. Make people think you want them, and you’ve got the whole world in your hands.” After years of living in the closet, trying to ignore the truth, Bruce is finally cornered and is forced to come out in a very public way. This leads to a series of challenges, blending his public and private life in way he can’t escape.

entry.title: La Belle et La Rose
entry.summary:
Author: Matador

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,311Chapters: 3/15Kudos: 8

Summary: Riquewihr is a strange place, people say. So steep in magic, with a beast as it's Lord... Harley's never paid the rumours any heed. Not when there are for more pressing issues closer to home. That is, until she finds herself volunteering to take her father's place in the belly of the beast: his castle. Beyond haunted, it's everything like the rumours and nothing like them at all. But is there more to the castle and it's terrifying occupant? And what of that rose, locked in the tower, of whom the Beast is most possessive of? (A Beauty & the Beast retelling)

entry.summary:
Author: SolventBoy

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,482Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 1

Summary: The man’s eyes widened behind his lenses. “Oh. Of course. Come in.” He stepped back, gesturing Bruce into a living space that was as small and cramped as the exterior suggested. Bruce’s gaze flickered down to his midsection. An oversized yellow cardigan couldn't quite conceal the swell of a pregnant belly.

entry.title: Skybound
entry.summary:
Author: Holdt

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 38,036Chapters: 4/13Kudos: 13

Summary: In a world where wings decide your place in society, a deadly disease is spreading through the population. Bruce and Clark are on the case, searching for the culprit as well as the cure.
